mapper.insert: insert into order_tb(orderno, uid, uaddress, uphone, price, opt, name, state) values (#{orderno}, #{vo.uid}, #{vo.uaddress}, #{vo.uphone}, #{vo.price},#{vo.opt}, #{vo.name}, #{state})
mapper.select: select* from join_tb as j, order_tb as o where j.uid = o.uid and j.uid=#{uid}
mapper.update: update order_tb set state=#{state} where orderno=#{orderno};
